#{item}

update.foreach:
update base_map_berth
biz_type = #{item.bizType},
point_alias = #{item.pointAlias},
operate_area_code = #{item.operateAreaCode},
biz_second_area_code = #{item.bizSecondAreaCode},
pod_code = #{item.podCode}
where ber_code = #{item.berCode}

mapper.select: select point_alias from base_map_berth where 1=1 and delete_flag = 0 and map_code = #{mapCode} and operate_area_code = 'lineArea' and biz_second_area_code is not null

select
from base_map_berth where 1=1 and map_code = #{mapCode} and biz_type = #{bizType} and pod_code != '' and pod_code is not null
select from base_map_berth where 1=1 and biz_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bizType},'%')
select from base_map_berth where 1=1 and operate_area_code = #{operateAreaCode} and (pod_code = '' or pod_code is null) and in_lock = 0 limit 1
select from base_map_berth where ber_code = #{berCode}

biz_type = #{record.bizType},

mapper.select: select from base_map_berth where point_alias LIKE CONCAT('2','%')
select from base_map_berth where(point_alias LIKE '1%' OR point_alias='307' OR point_alias='306')AND (pod_code is NULL OR pod_code='');
